help-file.title: "CONTROL WEATHER"
help-file.content:
This spell is currently inactive. Area of effect: Zone Aggressive: No Cumulative: Yes, but only once per hour Duration: Until the weather changes again (on the hour) Type of spell: Generic Syntax: cast 'control weather' <cold | warm | wet | dry | calm | windy>
By imagining a change in the weather, the caster is able to influence the atmosphere conditions toward the desired state. Susceptibility to change will vary according to the initial conditions at the time of casting. The spell lasts for one hour, during which time no further attempts to control the weather will be possible, as the magic becomes a part of the atmosphere itself, resisting change.
The caster of "control weather" can affect the weather in dramatic ways, having the power to bring forth rain and storm, wind and cold, from his or her fingertips.
